posts.post_content: I'm not even a control player and I appreciate that this card exists. A cheap sweeper is something the game has been missing for a while, and a damage-based exile effect is just gravy, to be honest. To be completely honest, it feels like this card is a little late to the party, but what the heck. It'll give slower decks yet another weapon against fast-paced players like me.
posts.html:
I'm not even a control player and I appreciate that this card exists. A cheap sweeper is something the game has been missing for a while, and a damage-based exile effect is just gravy, to be honest. Posted By: absreim (9/17/2013 11:19:31 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Hot dog, this is so similar to [Flamebreak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flamebreak)!  
  
3 CMC?  
Very Red?  
3 Damage?  
Means of crippling abilities?  
  
Yes, yes, yes, and pretty much. It's also almost impossible to say whether this is better or not.   
  
![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) versus ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) does make a difference, but dealing damage to all creatures vs. just creatures without flying can make or break your game (depending on who has flyers). Stopping regeneration vs. stopping graveyard whatnot is also impossible to determine which is better.   
And lastly, Flamebreak damages players as well. As much as I'd love to say that's a benefit, it can sometimes be a problem when you have 3 or less life!
posts.html:
Hot dog, this is so similar to Flamebreak!

3 CMC?
Very Red?
3 Damage?
Means of crippling abilities?

Yes, yes, yes, and pretty much. It's also almost impossible to say whether this is better or not.

versus does make a difference, but dealing damage to all creatures vs. just creatures without flying can make or break your game (depending on who has flyers). Stopping regeneration vs. stopping graveyard whatnot is also impossible to determine which is better.
And lastly, Flamebreak damages players as well. As much as I'd love to say that's a benefit, it can sometimes be a problem when you have 3 or less life!
